DIM_MINIPLAYER_AFTER_SECONDS: Dim miniplayer after _SECONDS_ seconds of inactivity
DISPLAY_REMAINING_DURATION_INSTEAD_OF_TO: Display remaining duration instead of total
DOWNLOADS_METADATA_TAGS_SUBTITLE: Extract artist, title & album from video info by default
SET_FILE_LAST_MODIFIED_AS_VIDEO_UPLOAD_D: Set file last modified as video upload date
YT_PREFER_NEW_COMMENTS_SUBTITLE: Cached version will only be used when there is no connection
